text: Shawn Michael Grate (born August 8, 1976) is an American convicted serial killer. He was born in Marion, Ohio. He was found guilty on May 7th, 2018 of all charges in Ashland County, Ohio. He killed a total of five people after raping them. On May 7, 2018, Grate was found guilty of murdering Stacey Stanley and Elizabeth Griffith. On June 1, Grate was sentenced to death. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American serial killers Category:American kidnappers Category:American rapists Category:American people convicted of manslaughter Category:Criminals from Ohio
title: Shawn Grate
